mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ants_user_base (studentId,userName,userSex, passWord,unpw,mobilePhone, address,portrait,userWechat, userQQ,registTime,qqHidden,wechatHidden) VALUES(#{studentId},#{userName},#{userSex}, #{passWord},#{unpw},#{mobilePhone}, #{address},#{portrait},#{userWechat}, #{userQQ},#{registTime},#{qqHidden},#{wechatHidden})
mapper.select: SELECT studentId,userName,mobilePhone, address,portrait,userWechat,userQQ FROM ants_user_base WHERE studentId = #{studentId}
